title: Anneliese Dodds – 2022 Comments on Short Terms in Office for Conservative Cabinet Members in 2022
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Anneliese Dodds, the Chair of the Labour Party, on Twitter on 19 October 2022.
content:
Days in office, 2022
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

2 – Michelle Donelan, Education Secretary  
38 – Kwasi Kwarteng, Chancellor  
43 – Suella Braverman, Home Secretary  
63 – Nadhim Zahawi, Chancellor  
? – Liz Truss, Prime Minister
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

This is chaos. If the Tories can’t govern, get out of the way for a party that can.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
